text: Christopher Matthew Cook is an American actor who portrayed Licari in Season 5 of AMC's The Walking Dead. He is also known for Dog Eat Dog and Hours. == Filmography == === Movies === {| |- style="background:#0ccccc; text- align:center;" ! Year ! Title !
